descendants.content:
@MatWright
So very sorry. It's visceral for me, because we had to evacuate our house in San Diego 3 times for 3 different wildfires in the span of about 10 years. Very best wishes to all.

descendants.content: @MatWright I am no fan of Smith, but it was pointed out that this is parks Canada territory and Parks Canada is in charge of fire fighting operations in its parks. However, one would hope Parks Canada could call upon provinces to help. If Parks Canada asks Canadian Forces instead of Alberta, I would blame Parks Canada. (no fan of Smith, but Parks Canada can be strange at times).
